name: Giant Cave Spider
description: Found in the depths of caverns, giant cave spiders have leg spans of 1 meter or more and are dangerous creatures for the unaware caver.

0.name: Bite
0.description: The spider bites its target with its fangs, pumping it full of venom. The target must make a DC10 FOR save or instantly take 1 additional Wound and gain the Poisoned status effect.

1.name: Shoot Web
1.description: The spider shoots a sticky glob of silk at a target up to 10m away. If it hits, the target is restrained by webbing, and must pass a DC10 MGT check to break out of it or be freed by another, using a source of Rending or Fire damage.
